content: the four finger gnome is a super fast gift or toy **it is definitely not for children aged 3 or under ** the beard is a loose unfinished pompom and the hat is crocheted top down using single_crochet the nose is glued on but could be sewn onto the brim of the hat to make it more secure if crocheted with suggested yarns the gnome is approximately 3 5 inches tall he was designed to use as a #warmfuzzy for the rocket city knots group kindness project please respect the designer this is a copyrighted pattern please do not sell it copy it share it or claim it as your own it is not designed for mass production feel free to make and sell or donate them in small quantities if you do please link to my pattern link or facebook page at love knot design thanks
